p: The cell-based cleavage assay does not require purification of the active protease, and represents closely the natural physiological state. Investigating the Isatis indigotica phenolic compounds as potential anti-SARS drugs, Lin et al. (2005) have made in-frame construction, containing the M pro, the substrate, and the luciferase, and transformed it into Vero cells. Since a more than 30 kDa protein fused at the N-terminus of the luciferase resulted in a dramatic decrease of luciferase activity, the detection of activity of luciferase was considered by authors as a measure for the cis-cleavage by M pro. Epigallocatechin gallate abundant in green tea ( Camellia sinensis), inhibits the proteolytic activity of SARS-CoV M pro, expressed in Pichia pastoris ( Nguyen et al., 2012).
